145.movie_plot: A farmer returns home from the Civil War, but his wife begins to suspect that the man is an impostor.

54.movie_plot: Babe, a pig raised by sheepdogs, learns to herd sheep with a little help from Farmer Hoggett.

24.movie_plot: After a space merchant vessel perceives an unknown transmission as a distress call, its landing on the source moon finds one of the crew attacked by a mysterious lifeform, and they soon realize that its life cycle has merely begun.

159.movie_plot: An unlucky in love nurse finds her life taking a detour when her mother places a personals ad in the paper, while on the other side of Boston, a plumber is trying to change careers.

59.movie_plot: A film of the early years of the reign of Elizabeth I of England and her difficult task of learning what is necessary to be a monarch.

94.movie_plot: A housewife who is unhappy with her life befriends an old lady in a nursing home and is enthralled by the tales she tells of people she used to know.

65.movie_plot: In 1839, the revolt of Mende captives aboard a Spanish owned ship causes a major controversy in the United States when the ship is captured off the coast of Long Island. The courts must decide whether the Mende are slaves or legally free.

152.movie_plot: A humourous and thought provoking view of what animals in zoos might be thinking about their captivity and surroundings.

58.movie_plot: In Casablanca in December 1941, a cynical American expatriate encounters a former lover, with unforeseen complications.

89.movie_plot: Wannabe actors become regulars in the stylish neo-lounge scene; Trent teaches his friend Mike the unwritten rules of the scene.

163.movie_plot: Underachieving, overweight kindergarten teacher Dex finds a woman who forces him to reexamine his Zen-like system of seduction.

86.movie_plot: Male nurse Greg Focker meets his girlfriend's parents before proposing, but her suspicious father is every date's worst nightmare.

15.movie_plot: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

126.movie_plot: When a retired engineer is called upon to rescue a failing satellite, he insists that his equally old teammates accompany him into space.

17.movie_plot: The aliens are coming and their goal is to invade and destroy Earth. Fighting superior technology, mankind's best weapon is the will to survive.

116.movie_plot: A true story of politics and art in the 1930s U.S., focusing on a leftist musical drama and attempts to stop its production.

57.movie_plot: A boy who communicates with spirits that don't know they're dead seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.

109.movie_plot: A glowing green orb - which embodies ultimate evil - terrorizes a young girl with an anthology of bizarre and fantastic stories of dark fantasy, eroticism and horror.

107.movie_plot: Three film students vanish after traveling into a Maryland forest to film a documentary on the local Blair Witch legend, leaving only their footage behind.
